page.title: 05Birmingham Schools Orchestra
page.content: There are{eleven musical ensembles}for Birmingham school pupils. Auditions are held every year for the Symphony, String, Recorder and Wind Orchestras. There is also a Guitar Group, a Chorale and a noisy and very popular Dance Band {A wide range of music is played}. The Wind Band and Concert Orchestra perform light music, while the Symphony Orchestra have included works by Sibelius and Tchaikovsky in this year's repertoire. Many concerts are organised throughout the year,{Birmingham Town Hall}being a popular venue. The Concert Orchestra did extremely well in a{Youth Festival} and have played in the {Royal Albert Hall}. The orchestras are given financial support by friends of the orchestras. Birmingham is very fortunate in it's opportunities for music making.
